World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest world news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ 2024 年 1 月 8 日星期一 04:49:42 GMT 120
Indonesia presidential frontrunner under fire as rivals attack defence plansIndonesian presidential frontrunner Prabowo Subianto suffered a barrage of attacks in a heated election debate on Sunday, with his two opponents taking aim at his military procurement strategy as defence minister, calling him reckless and wasteful. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 04:21:05 GMT E2WB6X4AONK6BJIPXQDDQB3OBY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/indonesia-presidential-frontrunner-under-fire-rivals-attack-defence-plans-2024-01-08/Reuters世界亚太地区
Ignoring Taiwan's complaints, more Chinese balloons spotted over straitTaiwan's defence ministry said it detected three more Chinese balloons flying over the Taiwan Strait on Sunday, one of which crossed the island, the latest in a spate of such balloons the ministry says it has spotted over the past month. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 02:44:36 GMT MZVGLYUCP5IUDGULHDJMI7QKMA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/ignoring-taiwans-complaints-more-chinese-balloons-spotted-over-strait-2024-01-08/Reuters世界亚太地区
Gambian ex-minister faces rape, torture charges in long-awaited Swiss trialSwitzerland will try a former Gambian minister under ousted dictator Yahya Jammeh for crimes against humanity on Monday in a milestone case where a serial rape victim will testify after a multi-decade wait for justice. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 02:11:54 GMT NTY36UBJZNJWTMMMBWEEJZG5ZQ https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/gambian-ex-minister-faces-rape-torture-charges-long-awaited-swiss-Trial-2024-01-08/Emma Farge世界非洲
Mass killer Breivik sues Norway in bid to end prison isolationAnders Behring Breivik, the far-right fanatic who killed 77 people in a bombing and shooting rampage in Norway in 2011, will ask a court on Monday to end his isolation in prison, saying it violates his human rights. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 02:06:10 GMT BCLERSQOQ5KMHEG6ECEVOXJMPE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/mass-killer-breivik-sues-norway-bid-end-prison-isolation-2024-01-08/Gwladys Fouche世界欧洲
Bangladesh PM Hasina secures fourth straight term as expectedBangladesh Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina swept to a fourth straight term as expected with her party winning an absolute majority in the general election, the poll body said on Monday, amid low turnout in the vote boycotted by the main opposition. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 01:44:10 GMT ZGBAD6HL4NIB3IW5AW3GV4RRGA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/bangladesh-pm-hasina-secures-fourth-straight-term-2024-01-08/Sudipto Ganguly, Ruma Paul世界亚太地区
Australia bans Nazi salute and public display of terror group symbolsIntroduced in June and passed in December, the law has taken on new significance amid a surge in antisemitism and Islamophobia following the Oct. 7 attack by Hamas in Israel. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 01:23:09 GMT GF2XGUIPGVLFHFSAW6XXDRUEQ4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/australia-bans-nazi-saute-public-display-terror-group-symbols-2024-01-08/Reuters世界亚太地区
China's top spy agency says it exposes British espionage caseChina said its security agencies found another incident of spying in which the British Secret Intelligence Service, also known as MI6, used a foreigner in China to collect secrets and information. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 01:20:12 GMT R4KJHX6RRVLXTPBDOIU5HG5LZM https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-top-spy-agency-says-it-exposes-british-espionage-case-2024-01-08/Reuters世界中国
Alaska Airlines cancels more than 200 flights after FAA orderAlaska Airlines said it had canceled 170 flights on Sunday and a further 60 on Monday, after the U.S. Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) ordered the grounding of 171 Boeing 737 MAX 9 airplanes to run inspections. Sun, 07 Jan 2024 23:53:55 GMT MU4BKQASTBPSJIV32AZAJ6GIDQ https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/alaska-airlines-cancels-170-flights-after-faas-order-2024-01-07/Reuters商业航空航天与国防
Blinken to visit UAE, Saudi, Israel, seeking to avert wider Middle East warThe U.S. secretary of state said he would tell Israeli officials that it is imperative they do more to prevent civilian casualties in Gaza and that Palestinian civilians must be allowed to return home and not be pressed to leave Gaza. Sun, 07 Jan 2024 23:19:08 GMT G7IA7B23PJK65E2T4DGQZ37RZQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/wrapup-blinken-uae-saudi-israel-monday-seeking-avert-wider-middle-east-war-2024-01-07/Simon Lewis, Nidal Al-Mughrabi, Emily Rose世界中东
Israeli police kill Palestinian girl during response to ramming attackIsraeli police killed a young Palestinian girl in a car at a West Bank crossing when they opened fire on another car suspected of a ramming attack, Israeli emergency services said. Sun, 07 Jan 2024 17:20:40 GMT AMCB4LYWMFJQXOMBJW5BYI6D3E https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-police-kill-palestinian-girl-when-responding-ramming-attack-emergency-2024-01-07/Reuters世界中东
Portugal's Socialists pledge to raise minimum wage, boost competitivenessThe new leader of Portugal's ruling Socialist Party (PS) Pedro Nuno Santos pledged on Sunday to increase the minimum wage and boost economic competitiveness through more incentives to select sectors, if he wins an election in March. Sun, 07 Jan 2024 17:15:03 GMT TW7EOD2HM5JT3JM3GGOLZIJGWE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/portugals-socialists-pledge-raise-minimum-wage-boost-competitiveness-2024-01-07/Sergio Goncalves世界欧洲
